projects.title: KeyMorphix - Wireless Keyboard
projects.description: KeyMorphix is a wireless keyboard app built in Kotlin that allows users to control their Windows PC using their mobile phone. The app connects via WebSockets to a server app installed on the PC, transforming your phone into a full-functioning keyboard and touchpad.
projects.detailed_des:
KeyMorphix - Wireless Keyboard

KeyMorphix is a wireless keyboard and touchpad app built in Kotlin that allows you to control your Windows PC directly from your mobile phone. Using WebSockets, KeyMorphix enables seamless communication between your device and a server app installed on your PC, transforming your phone into a fully functional keyboard and touchpad.

Wireless Keyboard Touchpad Kotlin WebSockets Mobile App Windows PC Networking Server Integration Auto Discovery Remote Control Android


Overview

KeyMorphix offers a convenient way to turn your mobile phone into a wireless keyboard and touchpad for your Windows PC. Whether you're giving a presentation, controlling media, or simply using your PC from a distance, KeyMorphix provides an intuitive and reliable solution. The app uses WebSockets for fast and responsive communication between the mobile device and the server app installed on the Windows PC. This allows for real-time control of your PC's keyboard and touchpad directly from your phone.

KeyMorphix automatically detects the server app running on your PC over the same network, making the connection process seamless. No need for complicated setup steps — just open the app, and it will automatically find the PC you're connected to. The app supports typing, touchpad controls, and multitouch gestures for added convenience.

Whether you're working from your couch, giving a presentation, or simply looking to control your PC remotely, KeyMorphix makes it easy and efficient. It's the perfect tool for anyone who needs to control their PC from their mobile device, all without the need for a physical keyboard or mouse.



Design Screen



Tech Stack

  • Kotlin
  • WebSockets
  • Android Development
  • Windows Server Integration
  • Automatic Discovery Mode
  • Networking (TCP/IP)
  • Mobile App Development
  • Server Communication


Features

  • Wireless Keyboard & Touchpad: Turn your phone into a wireless keyboard and touchpad for your Windows PC.
  • WebSocket Communication: Seamlessly communicates with the Windows PC using WebSockets for real-time control.
  • Automatic Discovery Mode: Automatically detects and connects to the server running on the same network, ensuring easy setup.
  • Multitouch Gestures: Supports multitouch gestures for a more intuitive touchpad experience, like pinch to zoom or scroll.
  • Typing Support: Type directly on your mobile phone to control the keyboard input of your PC.
  • Windows Server Integration: The server app installed on the Windows PC is designed to work seamlessly with the mobile app for full control.
  • Cross-platform Support: Works on Android devices, making it easy to control your PC from any smartphone or tablet.

projects.title: WallTrek - 4k Wallpaper
projects.description: WallTrek is a 4k wallpaper app built in Kotlin for Android, optimized for high-quality and seamless browsing. The app is designed to offer an unparalleled visual experience with security features like R8, ProGuard, and VPN detection to ensure your data stays secure.
projects.detailed_des:
WallTrek - 4k Wallpaper

WallTrek is a 4k wallpaper app built in Kotlin for Android, designed for those who demand the highest quality when it comes to their screen backgrounds. With a massive selection of stunning wallpapers, advanced security features, and an optimized UI, WallTrek is the ultimate wallpaper app that guarantees a seamless experience while prioritizing privacy and security.

4k Wallpapers Android Kotlin Optimized UI Security R8 ProGuard VPN Detection Network Security High-Resolution Privacy Wallpaper App


Overview

WallTrek is an advanced 4k wallpaper app crafted to deliver the best visual experience for Android users. Whether you’re looking to personalize your device with breathtaking nature scenes, urban landscapes, or abstract art, WallTrek offers an extensive library of high-resolution 4k images to suit all tastes and preferences.

What sets WallTrek apart from other wallpaper apps is its focus on optimized performance. With a custom-designed, sleek user interface, navigating the app is smooth, and downloading wallpapers is fast. Built using Kotlin, WallTrek is lightweight and efficient, ensuring that your wallpaper browsing experience is seamless and fast.

Additionally, WallTrek incorporates cutting-edge security features that make it one of the safest wallpaper apps available. With the use of R8 and ProGuard for code obfuscation, WallTrek ensures that your data and app integrity remain secure. Furthermore, WallTrek detects VPNs and network interceptors in real-time, ensuring that the app only functions in a trusted, secure environment. If a VPN or network interceptor is detected, WallTrek will prevent access to ensure the safety of your personal data.

WallTrek is not only about aesthetics and security; it’s also about giving users control over their wallpaper experience. With daily updates, favorites, and categorized wallpapers, it’s the perfect solution for those who love customizing their devices with the best possible content.



Design Screen



Security Features

WallTrek goes beyond being just a wallpaper app. It’s built with your privacy and data security in mind. Here's how:

  • R8 & ProGuard Protection: WallTrek uses R8 and ProGuard for code obfuscation, making it difficult for anyone to reverse-engineer the app and ensuring that your data remains protected.
  • VPN Detection: WallTrek actively detects any VPN connections, ensuring that the app is only used in secure and trusted environments. This feature guarantees that your data is not being intercepted while you browse or download wallpapers.
  • Network Interceptor Detection: The app is designed to detect any attempts to intercept network traffic, further enhancing its security. If any form of network monitoring or interception is detected, access to the app will be blocked to protect the integrity of your information.
  • Data Privacy: WallTrek respects your privacy, ensuring that no personal data is collected during usage. The app prioritizes user data security and confidentiality at every step.

These security features ensure that WallTrek isn't just a wallpaper app; it’s a safe and secure environment for you to enjoy a seamless experience with the utmost confidence.



Tech Stack

  • Kotlin
  • Android Development
  • R8 & ProGuard (Code Obfuscation)
  • VPN Detection
  • Network Interceptor Detection
  • High-Resolution Image Compression
  • Optimized UI for Performance
  • Custom Wallpaper Caching
  • Real-Time Data Encryption
  • Secure API Integration


Key Features

  • Massive 4k Wallpaper Library: WallTrek provides a vast collection of HD and 4k wallpapers across multiple categories like nature, abstract, and cityscapes.
  • Optimized UI for Seamless Experience: Navigate easily with a smooth and intuitive interface optimized for fast browsing and quick downloads.
  • Daily Wallpaper Updates: Get new and fresh wallpapers delivered daily to keep your device looking fresh.
  • Favorites & Collections: Save your favorite wallpapers and create collections for easy access later.
  • Trendy Wallpapers: Stay ahead of the trend with the latest and most popular wallpapers available on the app.
  • VPN & Interceptor Detection: The app detects VPNs and network interceptors to ensure you are in a secure, trusted environment while using the app.
  • Wallpaper Categories: Browse wallpapers by categories such as nature, architecture, cityscapes, abstract art, and more.
  • Wallpaper Download & Share: Download wallpapers to your device or share them with friends and family easily.

projects.title: App Analytics
projects.description: App Analytics SDK provides high-accuracy data tracking and analytics, offering similar functionality to Firebase Analytics, AppMetrica, and AppsFlyer. Supports Unity, Flutter, Java, and Kotlin apps.
projects.detailed_des:
App Analytics SDK

App Analytics SDK is a powerful, high-accuracy analytics tool that empowers developers to track user behavior and app performance across multiple platforms. With functionality similar to Firebase Analytics, AppMetrica, and AppsFlyer, this SDK enables you to make data-driven decisions to enhance your app's user experience and business outcomes. The SDK supports Unity, Flutter, Java, and Kotlin applications.

SDK Analytics Event Tracking Conversion Tracking Crash Reporting User Segmentation Firebase Analytics AppMetrica AppsFlyer Unity Flutter Java Kotlin


Overview

App Analytics SDK offers an advanced solution for tracking and analyzing app performance and user interactions. Built with a focus on high accuracy, the SDK provides all the essential analytics features you need for your mobile or game app, including real-time event tracking, user segmentation, app crash reporting, and conversion tracking. It gives you the power to understand your users’ behaviors and optimize your app’s features based on actionable insights.

The SDK is compatible with a variety of platforms, making it easy to integrate into your app, whether you’re developing with Unity, Flutter, Java, or Kotlin. With a simple and intuitive integration process, you can start gathering data quickly, and gain detailed insights into app performance, user retention, and in-app purchases.

App Analytics SDK is comparable to Firebase Analytics, AppMetrica, and AppsFlyer, but offers its own unique advantages, such as greater flexibility and higher accuracy in tracking events and conversions. This SDK is an invaluable tool for any developer looking to maximize their app’s potential with comprehensive and reliable analytics.



Design Screen



Tech Stack

  • Java
  • Kotlin
  • Unity
  • Flutter
  • Real-time Event Tracking
  • App Crash Reporting
  • User Segmentation
  • Conversion Tracking
  • Analytics Reporting
  • Firebase Analytics Integration
  • RESTful API Integration
  • High-Accuracy Tracking


Features

  • Real-time Event Tracking: Track user interactions and app events in real-time for immediate insights.
  • User Segmentation: Segment users based on demographics, behaviors, and custom attributes for targeted analytics.
  • App Crash Reporting: Monitor and report app crashes to help quickly identify and resolve issues that affect user experience.
  • Conversion Tracking: Measure app conversions, in-app purchases, and user actions to assess app success and optimize for better results.
  • Customizable Dashboards: View your analytics data in customizable dashboards for easier interpretation and decision-making.
  • Multi-Platform Support: Compatible with Unity, Flutter, Java, and Kotlin apps, allowing for seamless integration on various platforms.
  • High Accuracy: Enjoy a more accurate tracking solution for real-time user behavior, unlike traditional analytics tools.
  • Advanced Reporting Tools: Generate detailed reports to track your app’s performance, helping you identify trends and growth opportunities.
  • Flexible Integration: Easy-to-use SDK that integrates seamlessly with your existing app architecture.

projects.title: Clock Master - Custom Clock
projects.description: Clock Master is a versatile time utility app that combines five essential time management functions: Timer, World Clock, Alarm, Stopwatch, and Always On Display, all in one package.
projects.detailed_des:
Clock Master - Custom Clock

Clock Master is the ultimate time utility app that combines five essential time management functions: Timer, World Clock, Alarm, Stopwatch, and Always On Display. This all-in-one app is perfect for anyone who needs to stay organized and manage time effectively on a daily basis.

Java MVVM Retrofit Glide Alarm Stopwatch Timer Always On Display Material Design

Overview

Clock Master is designed to be the ultimate time management tool, combining five key features that every user needs throughout the day. From setting timers for various tasks to tracking the time across different time zones, Clock Master ensures that you stay organized and efficient.

The app features a customizable Timer for activities like cooking or exercising, a World Clock to keep track of time in different cities worldwide, an Alarm to wake you up with a sound of your choice, a Stopwatch for precise time tracking, and an Always On Display that shows the time at all times, whether you’re on your home screen or working in another app. Its modern and retro themes allow users to personalize the app according to their preferences, providing a stylish way to manage time.

With a user-friendly interface, Clock Master ensures that all these functions are accessible within a few taps. Whether you’re traveling, working out, or simply need a reliable tool to keep track of time, this app is your go-to solution.



Design Screen


Tech Stack

  • Native Java
  • MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)
  • Retrofit API for data communication
  • Glide for efficient image loading
  • JSON for data parsing
  • Android Jetpack Libraries (e.g., LiveData, ViewModel)
  • Material Design UI components
  • Customizable themes (Retro and Modern)
  • Alarm Manager and Timer APIs
  • Background Services for Always On Display


Features

  • Timer: Set customizable timers for various tasks like cooking, working, or exercising, and get notified when time's up.
  • World Clock: View a comprehensive world clock with multiple time zones, perfect for those who need to keep track of time across different locations.
  • Alarm: Set personalized alarms with unique sounds to wake up or remind you of important events and activities.
  • Stopwatch: Precisely track elapsed time for activities such as workouts, sports, or any other time-sensitive task.
  • Always On Display: A stylish always-on display feature that keeps the time visible on your screen at all times.
  • User-Friendly Interface: A clean, intuitive, and easy-to-navigate interface ensures that accessing any of the functions is quick and simple.
  • Retro & Modern Theme: Switch between retro and modern themes for customization and a visually appealing design that suits your style.

projects.title: Speaker Cleaner
projects.description: Speaker Cleaner is a native Java app that uses sound wave frequencies to clean phone speakers by removing water and dust, enhancing sound clarity.
projects.detailed_des:
Speaker Cleaner

Speaker Cleaner is a powerful utility app designed to restore the sound quality of your phone's speaker by using sound wave frequencies to remove water, dust, and other obstructions. Get clearer sound with automatic or manual cleaning options and enhance your device's audio performance.

Java Android Speaker Cleaner Sound Waves Multi-threading Microphone Test Headset Cleaner Audio Quality Notifications

Overview

Speaker Cleaner utilizes advanced sound wave frequencies to clean the phone’s speaker, removing water and dust that may impair the audio quality. By generating specific frequencies, it helps restore clear and crisp sound, improving the overall speaker performance. The app offers both automatic cleaning for ease of use and manual cleaning for more control. In addition to speaker cleaning, it includes useful features like a microphone test, wired and wireless headset cleaning, and sound testing for both the phone’s speaker and external headsets.

The app runs seamlessly with native Java and leverages multi-threading to ensure smooth performance while cleaning your phone’s speaker. Additionally, it sends weekly cleaning reminders, encouraging you to maintain your device’s audio quality regularly. Whether you need to clean the built-in phone speaker or your external headset, Speaker Cleaner ensures that your device’s audio stays in top condition.



Design Screen


Tech Stack

  • Native Java (Android)
  • Multi-threading for Performance Optimization
  • Sound Wave Frequency Generation for Cleaning
  • Audio and Sound Testing Libraries
  • Local Notifications for Weekly Reminders
  • Wired/Wireless Headset Support
  • Microphone and Speaker Test Functions


Features

  • Automatic Speaker Cleaning: Let the app clean your phone's speaker automatically by generating the perfect sound wave frequencies to clear out water and dust.
  • Manual Speaker Cleaning: For more control, manually select the cleaning mode and the frequency to remove blockages from the speaker.
  • Microphone Test: Test the microphone functionality and detect any issues with the device's audio input.
  • Wired/Wireless Headset Cleaner: Clean both wired and wireless headsets by applying the same sound wave cleaning techniques used for the phone’s speaker.
  • Speaker & Headset Sound Test: Test the sound quality of both your phone’s built-in speaker and any connected headsets, ensuring optimal performance.
  • Weekly Speaker Cleaning Reminders: Receive notifications every week to remind you to clean your device’s speaker and maintain optimal audio performance.

projects.title: J-Stan - Movie Streaming App
projects.description: A local network-based movie streaming app that lets you stream movies stored on your own device to any browser or mobile device connected to the same Wi-Fi network.
projects.detailed_des:
J-Stan

J-Stan is a movie streaming app that allows users to stream movies stored locally on their devices across different platforms via a local network. This solution enables streaming on any connected device within the same Wi-Fi network, offering a seamless, personalized viewing experience without relying on third-party services.

FlutterAsyncAPIStreaming

Overview

J-Stan revolutionizes the concept of movie streaming by offering a local network-based solution. Unlike traditional streaming platforms that require vast cloud storage and internet access to stream content, J-Stan allows users to stream movies that are stored on their own devices. By hosting movies directly from your PC, mobile phone, or any local server, J-Stan provides an innovative way to access content on multiple devices within the same Wi-Fi network.

With J-Stan, you can watch your favorite movies stored on your device anytime and anywhere within your home or local network. The app is designed to be efficient, offering real-time streaming with minimal buffering, even when multiple devices are connected. Whether you're using a mobile phone, tablet, or laptop, J-Stan ensures smooth playback without relying on the internet, making it an ideal solution for those who have large movie libraries stored locally and wish to access them without hassle.





Design Screen




Tech Stack

  • Flutter
  • Async Programming
  • API for Local Movie Streaming
  • Local Network Streaming
  • Backend Server Implementation
  • Video Playback Controls


Features

  • Local Movie Streaming: Stream movies stored on your device over a local Wi-Fi network to any connected device without the need for cloud storage or an internet connection.
  • Movie Player Interface: Play movies with a comprehensive set of controls including seek forward/backward, fullscreen, playback speed control, play/pause, and a seekbar for precise navigation to any part of the movie.
  • Multiple Device Compatibility: Seamlessly stream movies to various devices such as smartphones, tablets, laptops, and smart TVs as long as they are connected to the same local network.
  • Backend Server: The app features a robust backend server that efficiently fetches movies from local storage and serves them to connected devices for streaming.
  • Real-time Movie Fetching: Movies are fetched dynamically from your local storage and made available for instant streaming.
  • Easy Setup and Use: A simple onboarding process and minimal configuration required, making it easy for users to start streaming their local content within minutes.

projects.title: Sticky Me- Custom Stickers for WhatsApp
projects.description: It's an easy way to make your conversations more fun and expressive!
projects.detailed_des:
Sticker Me - Custom Stickers for WhatsApp

Sticker Me is a powerful tool for creating your own custom stickers for WhatsApp, and you can explore and choose from thousands of stickers. It's an easy way to make your conversations more fun and expressive!

Sticker Maker WhatsApp Custom Stickers Animated Stickers Background Remover Emojis Face Detection Text & Decorations Ad-Free


Overview

Sticker Me is your ultimate app for creating personalized stickers for WhatsApp. Whether you want to turn your photos into stickers, create animated stickers from GIFs or videos, or even remove backgrounds automatically, this app offers it all! You can enhance your stickers with text, emojis, and funny decorations, making your WhatsApp chats uniquely yours.

Additionally, Sticker Me lets you explore and download thousands of curated stickers, making it easy to find stickers for any occasion, from funny memes to movie-inspired designs. Share your custom sticker packs with friends and bring more fun to your conversations!



Design Screen



Tech Stack

  • Java
  • Native
  • Face Detection for Automatic Background Removal
  • Custom UI/UX Design
  • Sticker Pack Integration for WhatsApp
  • GIF & Video to Sticker Conversion
  • Firebase for Data Storage
  • Ad-Free Experience


Features

  • Create Stickers from Photos: Turn your favorite images into WhatsApp stickers.
  • Animated Stickers: Create stickers from GIFs and videos.
  • Automatic Background Remover: Face detection for easy and precise background removal.
  • Text, Emojis & Decorations: Add fun elements like text, emojis, and hats to your stickers.
  • Sticker Pack Sharing: Share your custom sticker packs with friends.
  • Sticker Collection: Browse and explore stickers for various occasions and emotions.
  • Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy an uninterrupted experience with the latest update.
  • WhatsApp Integration: Add your stickers directly to WhatsApp with our WASticker integration.


Permissions

To create and explore stickers from your WhatsApp chats, we will need access to the WhatsApp stickers folder. You will also be asked for permission to access photos, videos, or your camera when necessary. Stickers you create are stored privately on your device and will not be shared unless you decide to share them.

projects.title: Font Fusion - Stylish Keyboard
projects.description: Font Fusion is a powerful and versatile native Java keyboard app that offers stylish fonts, custom themes, kaomojis, and text decorations to express your individuality.
projects.detailed_des:
Font Fusion - Stylish Keyboard

Font Fusion is a versatile and powerful keyboard app that transforms your typing experience by offering stylish fonts, custom themes, kaomojis, and text decorations. Express yourself creatively in every message and make your texts stand out like never before!

Java Android Keyboard Font Customization Kaomojis Text Suggestions Themes Messaging UI Customization


Overview

Font Fusion is a dynamic keyboard app designed to elevate your communication with a variety of stylish fonts, customizable keyboard themes, and expressive kaomojis. Personalize your keyboard with visually stunning themes and make your messages unique with trendy fonts. You can also enhance your texts by adding text decorations, such as symbols and emojis, to make them more fun and visually engaging.

Seamlessly integrate Font Fusion into messaging apps and social media platforms to add creative flair to your messages. Whether you're texting a friend, posting on social media, or chatting with family, Font Fusion lets you stand out and express yourself in a fun and stylish way. The simple and user-friendly interface makes customization easy, ensuring that your keyboard looks and functions exactly the way you want it.

Additionally, Font Fusion provides text suggestions to help you type faster and more efficiently, improving your overall messaging experience. Download Font Fusion today and revolutionize your typing experience with stylish fonts, fun kaomojis, and endless customization options!



Design Screen



Tech Stack

  • Native Java (Android)
  • System-level Custom Keyboard Integration
  • Customizable Themes and Fonts
  • Text Suggestion Algorithms
  • Kaomojis (ASCII Emoticons)
  • Seamless Messaging App Integration
  • Easy UI for Customization


Features

  • Stylish Fonts: Choose from a wide range of trendy fonts to make your messages stand out and reflect your unique style.
  • Custom Keyboard Themes: Personalize your keyboard with beautiful and visually stunning themes to match your preferences.
  • Kaomojis: Add cute and expressive ASCII-based emoticons to spice up your messages and convey emotions creatively.
  • Text Decorations: Enhance your texts with symbols, emojis, and other creative elements to add flair to your messages.
  • Easy Integration: Integrates seamlessly with messaging apps and social media platforms, allowing for smooth communication in any app.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a simple and intuitive interface that makes it easy to customize your keyboard with just a few taps.
  • Text Suggestion: Speed up your typing with smart text suggestions, making your typing experience more efficient.
